name: CAC Avaluator English V2.0
description: The Avaluator is designed to help you make some of your most critical decisions before and during your backcountry trips. the information focuses on four key decision and travel skills: trip planning, identifying avalanche terrain, slope evaluation, and good travel habits. Visit the CAC website for more information.Includes booklet and card.Note: this item is intended to supplement, not replace professional avalanche training.
